good retro westernthemed fps adventure  the ai has the occasional hiccup but still delivers a good challenge even on a normal level  guns are true to the era and satisfying to shoot  skill tree unlocks better abilities and weapons  graphics are more than adequate to put you in the feeling of being back in the wild west and it runs very smoothly   all in all imho its aged pretty dang well

very basic xbox 360 era shooting but done well and with an attractive art style and surprisingly compelling narrative device the dueling minigame is also pretty fun with a modest amount of depth and the game has fantastic controller support this is without a doubt one of the better fps experiences on steam deck
